issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Backport: EUCA-6817 Meta Data failing during BFEBS tests

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Metadata service is  failing during BFEBS tests. 
Not much info yet other than these tests were passing during our 3.3.0 final runs but is failing today (across the board AFAIK)  with systems built from main testing. I have not tried maint/testing(3.3.1) yet.  Guest(s) are showing that cloud-init is timing out waiting for Metadata after about ~15 minutes. 

(Guessing we can ignore the first time stamp here resulting in the 26260 seconds reported by cloud-init, in this case I stop/started the instance to enable vnc on the NC). 
I will also test with instance_store instances on these systems and add that info to this ticket. 
Thanks,
-M

From boot.log on guest:
...
...
cloud-init running: Thu, 27 Jun 2013 14:19:04 -0700. up 22.53 seconds
waiting for metadata service at http://169.254.169.254/2009-04-04/meta-data/instt
ance-id
  14:19:04 [ 1/100]: empty data [200]
  21:19:06 [ 2/100]: empty data [200]
  21:19:07 [ 3/100]: empty data [200]
...
... 
 21:35:44 [98/100]: empty data [200]
  21:36:04 [99/100]: empty data [200]
  21:36:24 [100/100]: empty data [200]
giving up on md after 26260 seconds
Could not find data source
Failed to get instance data
init: cloud-init main process (666) terminated with status 1
fields.summary: Meta Data failing during BFEBS tests
fields.environment:
GIT_HASH	119d5d161405f197d4271b8fe6a46a3f2f14012b

10.111.5.60	CENTOS	6.3	64	BZR	[CLC CC00 SC00 WS UI]
10.111.5.61	CENTOS	6.3	64	BZR	[NC00]

comments.body:
To verify the fix access meta-data from an instance using a version with a date, e.g.:

{code}
# curl http://169.254.169.254/2009-04-04/meta-data
ami-id
ami-launch-index
ami-manifest-path
block-device-mapping/
hostname
instance-id
instance-type
kernel-id
local-hostname
local-ipv4
mac
placement/
public-hostname
public-ipv4
public-keys/
ramdisk-id
reservation-id
security-groups
{code}

the versions "latest" and "1.0" should also be tested.

I am seeing this with instance-store backed instances too. I am using ubuntu precise image,
http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/precise/current/ (built on: 02-Jul-2013)

{noformat}
2013-07-03 20:51:22,144 - util.py[WARNING]: 'http://169.254.169.254/2009-04-04/meta-data/instance-id' failed [0/120s]: empty data [200]
{noformat}

complete console log,
{noformat}
[root@h-31 ~]# euca-get-console-output i-2C20442C
i-2C20442C
2013-07-04T03:54:31.076Z
^[[1;256r^[[256;256H^[[6n
Google, Inc.
Serial Graphics Adapter 12/07/11

Term: 80x24
4 0
